TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WebHeaderCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class WebHeaderCollection Inherits NameValueCollection Implements ISerializable

summary.span: 包含與要求或回應關聯的通訊協定 (Protocol) 標頭。

span.span: Contains protocol headers associated with a request or response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別通常透過存取或。The class is generally accessed through or . 某些常見的標頭會被視為受限制，而且可以是直接由應用程式開發介面公開 (例如`Content-Type`) 或受保護的系統，而且無法變更。Some common headers are considered restricted and are either exposed directly by the API (such as `Content-Type`) or protected by the system and cannot be changed. 受限制的標頭如下：The restricted headers are: - 接受Accept - 連線Connection - Content-LengthContent-Length - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - 預期Expect - 主機Host - If-Modified-SinceIf-Modified-Since - 範圍Range - 推薦者Referer - Transfer-EncodingTransfer-Encoding - User-AgentUser-Agent - Proxy-ConnectionProxy-Connection

summary.span: 將指定標頭插入至集合。

span.span: Inserts the specified header into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `header`參數必須指定"name: value"格式。The `header` parameter must be specified in the format "name:value". 如果指定的標頭不存在於集合中，新標頭加入至集合。If the specified header does not exist in the collection, a new header is added to the collection. 如果標頭中指定`header`已存在於集合的值部分中`header`串連現有值。If the header specified in `header` is already present in the collection, the value part of the `header` is concatenated with the existing value. ## Examples 下列範例會將名稱/值組加入使用方法。The following example adds a name/value pair to a using the Method. [!code-cpp[WebHeaderCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_Add/CPP/webheadercollection_add.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebHeaderCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_Add/CS/webheadercollection_add.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebHeaderCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_Add/VB/webheadercollection_add.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的標頭不存在，方法會將新的標頭插入至標頭名稱/值組的清單。If the specified header does not exist, the method inserts a new header into the list of header name/value pairs. 如果指定的標頭已存在，`value`加入至以逗號分隔的清單相關聯的標頭值。If the specified header is already present, `value` is added to the comma-separated list of values associated with the header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回`true`表示標頭受到限制，而非直接使用屬性必須設定或已由系統設定。The method returns `true` to indicate that a header is restricted and must be set using properties instead of directly or is set by the system. 受限制的標頭如下：The restricted headers are: - 接受Accept - 連線Connection - Content-LengthContent-Length - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - 預期Expect - 主機Host - If-Modified-SinceIf-Modified-Since - 範圍Range - 推薦者Referer - Transfer-EncodingTransfer-Encoding - User-AgentUser-Agent - Proxy-ConnectionProxy-Connection ## Examples 下列範例會檢查屬性，查看被禁止任何標頭設定。The following example checks the property to see if any headers are prohibited from being set. summary.span: 從集合中移除指定的標頭。

span.span: Removes the specified header from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從集合中刪除指定的標頭。 deletes the specified header from the collection. 如果指定的標頭不存在，方法會傳回。If the specified header does not exist, the method returns. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法中移除的標頭從。The following example uses the method to remove a header from the . 標頭移除之後，此範例會列印至畫面來證明它有已移除所有現有的標頭。After the header is removed, this example prints all existing headers to the screen to prove that it has been removed. [!code-cpp[WebHeaderCollection_Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_Remove/CPP/webheadercollection_remove.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebHeaderCollection_Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_Remove/CS/webheadercollection_remove.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebHeaderCollection_Remove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_Remove/VB/webheadercollection_remove.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將指定的標頭設定為指定的值。

span.span: Sets the specified header to the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的標頭中的標頭不存在，方法會將新的標頭插入至標頭名稱/值組的清單。If the header specified in the header does not exist, the method inserts a new header into the list of header name/value pairs. 如果標頭中指定`header`已存在，`value`取代現有的值。If the header specified in `header` is already present, `value` replaces the existing value.
